TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableFooterRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

span.span: Represents a footer row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示中的頁尾資料列控制項。The class represents a footer row in a control. 此類別會支援畫面大小有限制的裝置上顯示的資料表。This class supports displaying tables on devices with a limited screen size. 在這些裝置上，必須跨多個頁面轉譯具有許多資料行和資料列的資料表。On these devices, a table with many columns and rows must be rendered across multiple pages. 新增至控制項可讓您指定的最後一列會顯示資料表的檢視每個頁面上轉譯的頁尾資料列。Adding a to a control allows you to specify a footer row that is rendered as the last row on each page that displays a view of the table. 如需有關轉譯畫面大小有限制在裝置上的資料表的檢視格式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the view formats for a table rendered on a device with a limited screen size, see . A物件只可包含物件。A object can contain only objects. 若要將內容加入至，您必須新增一或多個資料列的物件。To add content to the , you must add one or more objects to the row. 然後，設定每個屬性物件中指定的每個資料格內容的資料列。Then, set the property of each object in the row to specify the contents of each cell. 或者，您可以在其中新增控制項以物件來指定其內容。Alternatively, you can add a control to a object to specify its contents. 您可以以程式設計方式管理的資料格中使用集合。You can programmatically manage the cells in the by using the collection. 集合是一堆代表資料列中的儲存格的物件。The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. 繼承屬性從，可讓您控制資料列中的內容的顯示方式。The inherits properties from that allow you to control how the contents in the row are displayed. 例如，您可以使用和屬性來指定內容的對齊方式。For example, you can use the and properties to specify the alignment of the contents. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立宣告式語法控制項，其和。The following code example demonstrates the declarative syntax for creating a control that has a and a . [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass1/VB/tableheaderrowclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立控制項，其和。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a control that has a and a . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/CS/tableheaderrowclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/VB/tableheaderrowclass2vb.aspx#1)]
